name: Anvil C8R Pisces Rescue
name_cn: 铁砧 C8R 双鱼座 救护型
description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Medical
With the addition of an onboard Tier 3 Medical Bed, the C8R Pisces can treat minor injuries and keep a patient stable while transporting them to the safety of a larger ship, station, or nearby medical facility, making it an invaluable asset for short-range search and rescue.
description_cn:
制造商：铁砧航天(Anvil Aerospace)
定位：医疗
有了船上增设的T3医疗床，C8R双鱼座能够治疗轻微创伤，还能在转运患者到更大型飞船、空间站或是附近医疗设施的路途中保持他们的病情稳定，也让其成为执行短距搜救任务的宝贵资产。

shop_rent.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-BestInShow_Kiosk
